greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of partitions or zones in the last section of the set of partitions of n that contains k as a part.
comment: It appears that row n lists A000041(n)-1 together with the row n-2 of the triangle A116598, if n >= 2.
xref: Column 1 is A000041. Columns >= 2 are A002865.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 10 2012
